remarks: Discharge the centralizer assumption in a commutative monoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)
statement:
cntzcmnf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
cntzcmnf.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
cntzcmnf.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
cntzcmnf.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
cntzcmnf $p |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
